00026 #ifndef STPWATCH_H
00027 #define STPWATCH_H
00028 
00029 // for clock() and CLOCKS_PER_SEC
00030 #include <ctime>
00031 
00032 namespace TNT
00033 {
00034 
00035 /*  Simple stopwatch object:
00036 
00037         void    start()     : start timing
00038         double  stop()      : stop timing
00039         void    reset()     : set elapsed time to 0.0
00040         double  read()      : read elapsed time (in seconds)
00041 
00042 */
00043 
00044 inline double seconds(void)
00045 {
00046     static const double secs_per_tick = 1.0 / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00047     return ( (double) clock() ) * secs_per_tick;
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 class stopwatch {
00052     private:
00053         int running;
00054         double last_time;
00055         double total;
00056 
00057     public:
00058         stopwatch() : running(0), last_time(0.0), total(0.0) {}
00059         void reset() { running = 0; last_time = 0.0; total=0.0; }
00060         void start() { if (!running) { last_time = seconds(); running = 1;}}
00061         double stop()  { if (running) 
00062                             {
00063                                 total += seconds() - last_time; 
00064                                 running = 0;
00065                              }
00066                           return total; 
00067                         }
00068         double read()   {  if (running) 
00069                             {
00070                                 total+= seconds() - last_time;
00071                                 last_time = seconds();
00072                             }
00073                            return total;
00074                         }       
00075                             
00076 };
00077 
00078 } // namespace TNT
00079 
00080 #endif
